conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through the baffles to determine which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into.
The baffles are vertical structures that the liquid flows through.
Liquid flows from A, B, and C and needs to be directed into either D or E.
Blue liquid flows through the blue baffle.
Blue liquid flows into the blue container (D).
Yellow liquid flows through the yellow baffle.
Yellow liquid flows into the yellow container (E).
Pink liquid flows through the pink baffle.
Pink liquid flows into the pink container (D).
Blue liquid flows into container D.
Yellow liquid flows into container E.
Pink liquid flows into container D.
The blue and pink liquids will flow into container D.
The yellow liquid will flow into container E.
Final answer: Blue and pink liquids flow into container D, yellow liquid flows into container E.
